primitiveValues.textValue: How do I cancel my staking on Desktop?

ConversationMessageDefinition.label: How do I cancel my staking on Desktop?

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
1. Log in to your Ndax account 2. Click on the 'Staking' tab on the left hand side of the screen 3. Scroll through the list of assets you have staked and click on the 3 dots button next to your 'Active Subscriptions' 4. Click 'Unstake' 5. Select either 'Full amount' or 'Partial' If you selected 'Partial', choose the amount or percentage you would like un-staked. 6. Select 'Standard' or 'Instant' redemption (depending on your plan, instant redemption might not be available) 7. If you selected 'Partial', choose the amount or percentage you would like un-staked 8. Click the green 'Confirm' button
Please note that there is an un-bonding period between 1-28 days, depending on the staking plan you have. Once the un-bonding period is complete, your crypto will return to your Ndax wallet.
